title: Audit xplat target changes
body: We've made some changes to `.props` and `.targets` files that ship with MSBuild in the xplat branch. Many just conditionalize behavior based on engine runtime--those are probably fine. But there shouldn't be any changes to standard desktop builds, unless they're intentional and correct.

nodes.body: Marking this as complete: we shipped VS2017 RC from the xplat branch and haven't yet seen any break-the-world changes. We believe the way forward is to fix any problems that we discover in xplat, rather than revert to the two-branch world.
